content.en: Energy consumption forecasting: Researchers have developed various algorithms to accurately forecast energy consumption in different regions. These algorithms, such as the particle swarm optimization algorithm and the whale optimization algorithm, are used in novel prediction models like the grey prediction model and the power-driven grey model. By applying these algorithms, scientists aim to improve the accuracy of energy consumption forecasts in countries like China and Japan, as well as predict global renewable energy consumption.
content.da: Forudsigelse af energiforbrug: Forskere har udviklet forskellige algoritmer til præcist at forudsige energiforbrug i forskellige regioner. Disse algoritmer, såsom partikel svermoptimeringsalgoritmen og hvaloptimeringsalgoritmen, anvendes i nye forudsigelsesmodeller som grå forudsigelsesmodel og den kraftdrevne grå model. Ved at anvende disse algoritmer sigter videnskabsfolk mod at forbedre nøjagtigheden af energiforbrugsforudsigelser i lande som Kina og Japan samt at forudsige globalt forbrug af vedvarende energi.
